Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
other comprehensive income loss net of tax period increase decrease
other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to parent

Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital other
new accounting pronouncement or change in accounting principle cumulative effect of change on equity or net assets1

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value new issues

Stock Repurchases: share repurchases related to employee stock based compensation awards
stock redeemed or called during period value
treasury stock value acquired cost method
Tax Effects from Stock Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital from share based compensation and related tax effects
__unmapped__: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation and exercise of stock options
common stock held in trust liquidation
